due to bites from red-tailed vipers has also
increased. Nam, a patient bitten by a snake, is being
treated at the poison intensive care unit of the
Central Highlands General Hospital.
The patient was admitted to the hospital with a condition in his hand that was
swollen and painful, red blood cells, anaphylactic shock, a
blood clotting disorder, his hand was swollen
like this, his eyes were dreaming or he was paralyzed and his body was lying
down, like he couldn't
feel anything anymore. According to  Statistics from the
Department of Active Poison Control from September
to present through receiving and treating
more than 150 patients bitten by snakes,
mainly red-tailed vipers, it is worth mentioning that
many patients came to the hospital in a
dangerous state.  In the case of late admission to the hospital due to the use of
traditional medicine to first aid patients who came in,
most of them had to use serum even
when they entered the hospital, their wounds had already healed
a lot.
Doctors recommended not to apply
traditional medicinal leaves because  It is very
likely that it will make the condition
more serious. People who have been bitten by a snake
must wash the wound with clean water and
quickly go to the nearest medical facility for
timely treatment and intervention.
Western Truong Sa district,
Khanh Hoa province, just performed emergency surgery on
a fisherman suffering from acute appendicitis. On the same
day, Region B, the Navy also rescued Thanh Cong,
a fishing boat in distress on the waters in a
borderline area, bringing 14 fishermen back to shore safely.  The
entire fishing boat was in distress with the number bd9893f
so it had to be set adrift. The captain
asked for help in receiving information using the Navy Department
who dispatched ship 471 to quickly
tow the fishing boat to bring the 14 fishermen on board back
safely and recover.
Troubleshooting in Truong Sa district on the

Mr. Trieu's health is stable and
continues to stay on the island for treatment.  Monitoring and

in the latest deposit interest rate table

Vietcombank has just reduced the savings deposit interest rate by a
maximum of 0.4 percentage points for
deposit customers.  Savings with a term of 1 to
2 months at this bank only have an interest
rate of 2.4 p.m. per year. The interest rate for long term deposits
of 12 months or more is currently 4.8 p.m. per
year. This is a record low interest rate for

Upcoming Tet travel is difficult to afford.
Service prices have increased by 10 to 15 minutes
compared to last year. The increase in ticket prices also
has a significant impact on the exploitation of
Tet tourism, including domestic tourism businesses with
many businesses.  The travel industry is still
trying to stabilize tour prices compared to the same
period last year. This year, there is a tendency to book tours

condition for us to book services
and products at good prices.  Many
families, instead of expecting to hunt for
cheap tours, quickly booked their tours early to
receive incentives from travel agencies and were
also more thoughtful in preparing for the trip due to
market price developments.
This year's fluctuations are not at its

In recent months alone, Ethiopia, Kenya
and Somalia have suffered the most serious Han flood
in the past 40 years and then a once-in-a-

died to prevent coastal erosion. Belgium is
testing a solution that is to create
an offshore reef from
these underground sun-dissolving mussels that can limit the
harmful effects of the Manh current in the
North Sea.  At the same time, developing
biodiversity, this is the result of cooperation between
research institutes and Belgian companies specializing in
offshore construction carried out for 6
years in Lapan near the French border. The
principle is to tie ropes made from
Natural biodegradable material in
deep water at a certain limit so that
mussel larvae can attach to molluscs
and then gather together
vertically, gradually creating
a natural barrier.  However, with the flow in
the water layer between low water and
deep water where sand is often swept away when
the mussels are too heavy with ropes clinging to
clumps, the mussels will naturally fall to the bottom of the water and
thereby form a new ecosystem.
If mussels fall, we get a
coral reef that attracts predators who like to eat mussels.
For example, starfish and
other fish or anemones can live
in the same area of ​​this biological coral reef.
has the effect of bringing suspended sediments

morning, the jury of the People's Court of Ho Chi Minh
City  Ho Chi Minh City has announced a
first instance verdict against Nguyen Minh Quan, former
director of Thu Duc city hospital and his
accomplices. These are the defendants in the case of embezzlement of
assets and money laundering in violation of
bidding regulations, causing serious consequences.
Among the defendants, Nguyen Minh Quan was
sentenced to a total of 21 years in prison. Nguyen
Van Loi, company director Nguyen
Tam, was sentenced to 15 years in prison. Nguyen Tran Ngoc Diem,
Mr. Quan's wife, was sentenced to 3 years in prison. However, the sentence was suspended for the
remaining six charges.  Again
sentenced to 2 years and 6 months to 3 years and 6
months in prison for civil liability, defendant
Quan must compensate Thu Duc City Hospital
more than 102 billion VND according to the
case file of defendant Quan abusing his position and power.
The deadline instructed defendant Loi to establish and use
backyard companies to sign contracts
to increase the price of machinery and equipment and then
prepare documents to participate in the bidding for the hospital. At the same
time, the military directed to put pressure on the
employees under  The right to
collude in the right to appropriate documents to assign the
winning mining companies to
appropriate more than 103 billion VND. In addition to this case,
Quan Quan was also accused of
violating bidding related to purchasing sizes.

Carrying out autopsy work and seizing
related items including guns and
bullets, Vinh Long city police today
investigated to clarify the cause of a
man's death in the area. The
cause was initially determined.  It was because the
victim caused the accident himself at
about 8:00 a.m., people of Tan
Hoa commune discovered a motorbike and a
body lying in a puddle of water along the My
Kidney bridge slope on the bank of Vinh Long, so they reported it to the
police authorities.  Vinh
Long city coordinated with professional crime
scene investigation units to conduct an
autopsy to verify the identity of the deceased
according to the results of the investigation. The victim's name is
Nguyen Nhat Tai, born in 1981, residing in
Tan Hoa ward, Vinh Long city.  The
driver of the car with license plate number 64 AC
00372, through an autopsy, the police
determined that the victim fell
into a puddle of water while driving, leading to his
death. Another case of illegal transportation
was discovered and arrested violently.  Subject
Le Xuan Vinh, 31 years old, from Thanh Hoa, who
just fell into the net of Chau Thanh district police,
Tay Ninh province, when he transported more than 1 ton of firecrackers
for sale through situation monitoring work at
1:10 this morning in Dong Khoi commune,
Chau district.  In Tay Ninh province, the
police and border guards caught Le Xuan
Vinh red-handed driving a truck carrying more than 1
ton of firecrackers and explosives of all kinds. The authorities
made a record of temporary seizure of all
the treasures and means.  At the
police station, Vinh was forced to confess that the fireworks were
transported for hire from the
border area of ​​Chau Thanh district to be
consumed. Currently, the case is being
further investigated to clarify and handle according to
regional regulations.
Green grocery supermarket warehouse in Trang Dai ward,
Bien Hoa city, Dong Nai province suddenly caught fire
this morning. No
human casualties were recorded, but there was great loss of
property. The fire occurred at 8:00 a.m.  On the same
day, in the warehouse area of
hundreds of square meters, a fire was discovered. The staff
shouted and the customers fled.
Immediately after that, many people used
mini fire extinguishers and water hoses on the spot to
put out the fire. However, the smoke was very black.  The fog and
heat radiated made it difficult to put out the fire. The
fire prevention and fighting force of
Dong Nai province police and
Bien Hoa city police both sent two specialized vehicles
and 10 soldiers to the scene to
coordinate with the fire prevention force.  The fire department
of Trang Dai ward participated in putting out the fire.
After about 1 hour, the fire
was completely extinguished.
Trang Dai ward police blocked and protected the
scene in coordination with the fire prevention police force of
the city police.
Bien Hoa City and Dong Nai province are investigating to
verify the cause of the fire and estimate the
damage. This morning, the HTV Chall Cup 2023 white election event
officially opened in
